title: *NO FEE* 3 Bed 3 Bath | PENTHOUSE | W/D | Hell's Kitchen
posting_body: ['*NO BROKER FEE* Call or text to see in person today!', '(William - 323.219.4160)', 'This large Penthouse 3 bed 3 bath on the top floor offers unparalleled city views.', 'The kitchen features a Casearstone countertops, a 5 burner stove, stainless steel appliances, a wine fridge, and custom built vineyard oak with frosty white cabinets.', 'The main bedroom has an en suite bathroom and all three bedrooms have ample closet space.', 'Some of the other high end features are an in unit washer and dryer, NEST thermostat, custom-made solar shades, and LATCH key entry.', 'This unit also comes with wide plank flooring throughout.', 'THE BUILDING:', 'Basketball Court', 'BBQ Grilling Area', 'Bike Storage', 'Classes (yoga, dance, strength training)', 'Concierge Service', 'Conference Rooms', 'Cooking and Mixology Classes', 'Deck', 'Drycleaning', 'Elevator', 'Fitness Center (The Mirror, Peloton Bikes, Smith Machine, Stairmaster, Versa Climber, kettleballs, and more)', 'Free Same Day Grocery Delivery', 'Full Time Doorman', 'Game Nights', 'Garage', 'Housekeeping', 'Live-in Super', 'Movie Screenings', 'Nursery/Playroom', 'Package Room', 'Private Storage', 'Resident Lounge (Fireplace, Pool Table, Foosball, and Table Tennis)', 'Roof Deck with 360-degree Panoramic Views of Midtown, the Hudson River, and Hudson Yards', 'Sauna', 'Skyline View', 'Valet Service', 'Wellness Events', 'THE LOCATION:', 'Close to the Hudson River, Javits Center, Hudson Yards, Gotham West Market, Restaurant Row, Manhattan Plaza Health Club, Harbor NYC Rooftop, Pier 76, Pier 84, Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum, Target, Brooklyn Fare, Port Authority, Times Square, and easily accessible via the 1, 2, 3, A, C, E, N Q, R, W, and S subway lines.', '*NER is based on the gross rent (with one month free) of $10,255.', '*Photos represent the finishes.', '*Call, text, or reply for more information or to schedule a showing.', '(For a faster response please call or text.)', 'William Noorlag | Nest Seekers International', '323.219.4160']
